text: Maurice Legg is a male former rower who competed for England. He had six children. In order of age they are: Suzanne, Stephanie, Michael, David, Peter and John Paul. ==Rowing career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the eights and a bronze medal in the coxed fours at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. He was a member of the King's College BC and Thames Rowing Club and rowed at bow. ==References== Category:English male rowers Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in rowing Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for England Category:Rowers at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Maurice Legg
